Make FASTA database summary

Source: R/fasta_utils.R
make_fasta_summary.Rd

Generates database statistics including number of sequences and amino acid frequencies. Extracted from prozor package to reduce dependencies.

Usage

make_fasta_summary(resDB, old = FALSE, as_string = TRUE)

Arguments

resDB

A list of sequences from prozor::readPeptideFasta

old

Logical; use old (slower) method for AA frequency calculation

as_string

Logical; return formatted string (TRUE) or list (FALSE)

Value

If as_string=TRUE, an array of strings to pass to cat(). If as_string=FALSE, a list with nrSequences, lengthSummary, and aafreq.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
fasta <- prozor::readPeptideFasta("path/to/file.fasta")
cat(make_fasta_summary(fasta))
} # }
